  <p class="tagline"><b>Eco</b> — Ecology / Ecosystems<br><b>Sense</b> — Sensing (remote sensing, monitoring) <br> + Intelligent understanding</p>
  </div>
  <div class="group-description-box">
  <p>
      <b>We are ecologists at Duke University's <a href="https://nicholas.duke.edu/" target="_blank">Nicholas School of the Environment</a>, dedicated to understand terrestrial ecosystem processes using a variety of tools:</b>
      <ul>
        <li>Satellite remote sensing (Solar-induced chlorophyll fluorescence, Optical remote sensing, Thermal remote sensing)</li>
        <li>Artificial intelligence (Interoperable AI, Process-informed machine learning)</li>
        <li>Land surface modeling to better represent carbon and water fluxes</li>
      </ul>
  </p>
  <p>
      <b>Our research aims to bridge fundamental ecological science with real-world applications that deliver socioeconomic benefits, including but not limited to:</b>
      <ul>
        <li>Enhancing forest management to increase carbon sequestration</li>
        <li>Improving crop yields and water use efficiecny to support food and water security</li>
        <li>Mitigating urban heat to protect public health</li>
      </ul>
  </p>
  </div>
</div>
:::

## Research Highlights

<div style="overflow-x: auto; white-space: nowrap; scroll-snap-type: x mandatory; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;">
  
  <div class="card d-inline-block me-3" style="width: 60%; max-width: 530px; scroll-snap-align: start;">
  <img src="pics/publications/Ren_NatureFood_small.jpg" class="card-img-top" alt="Publication 2">
  <div class="card-body">
  <h5 class="card-title">Irrigation and nitrogen optimization for US crops</h5>
  <p class="card-text">This study highlights the importance of integrated irrigation and nitrogen management in promoting sustainable resource use while maintaining crop yields under warming, published in <a href="https://www.nature.com/articles/s43016-024-01107-6" target="_blank">*Nature Food*</a>.</p>
  </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="card d-inline-block me-3" style="width: 60%; max-width: 530px; scroll-snap-align: start;">
  <img src="pics/publications/He_PNAS.jpg" class="card-img-top" alt="Publication 3">
  <div class="card-body">
  <h5 class="card-title">Impacts of air quality on photosynthesis</h5>
  <p class="card-text">Using satellite observations, we reveal that reducing particulate pollution has the potential to enhance ecosystem productivity by increasing carbon uptake from the atmosphere, published in <a href="https://www.pnas.org/doi/abs/10.1073/pnas.2306507120" target="_blank">*PNAS*</a>.</p>
  </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="card d-inline-block me-3" style="width: 60%; max-width: 530px; scroll-snap-align: start;">
  <img src="pics/publications/Yin_ScienceAdvances.jpg" class="card-img-top" alt="Publication 4">
  <div class="card-body">
  <h5 class="card-title">Unequal exposure to heatwaves in Los Angeles</h5>
  <p class="card-text">Using NASA ECOSTRESS data, we find that low-income neighborhoods in Los Angeles experience higher land surface temperature during heatwaves, published in <a href="https://www.science.org/doi/full/10.1126/sciadv.ade8501" target="_blank">*Science Advances*</a>.</p>
  </div>
  </div>

  <div class="card d-inline-block" style="width: 60%; max-width: 530px; scroll-snap-align: start;">
  <img src="pics/publications/Cen_OneEarth.jpg" class="card-img-top" alt="Greening Urban Spaces">
  <div class="card-body">
  <h5 class="card-title">Global patterns of nitrogen saturation in forests</h5>
  <p class="card-text">The map of forest nitrogen status is developed to support the implementation of region-specific environmental management practices, published in <a href="https://www.cell.com/one-earth/fulltext/S2590-3322(24)00531-1" target="_blank">*One Earth*</a>.</p>
  </div>
  </div>
  
</div>
